name: Beaverland (Kram, Regoma, Christophe T., AugProduction)
description:
Bearverland is a coop local game in a mix between Tower Defense and ressources management.

Try to defend yourself face to the opposite kingdom, your enemies. Build towers, recruit soldiers and defeate the evil King !

Realized with 4 students during a 48hours GAME JAM organized by e-artsup.

TEAM JOSEPH

BOSIA Quentin : Programe, Game Design

FOUCARD Auguste : Programer, VFX, Sound Design

TRAN Christophe : 2D Artist, UI, Character Design

FONTAINE Bastien : 2D Artist, UI, Environment, Prop
